rooms.description: The entrance is located on the main facade with a secure entry gate and reception area. The design adheres to local building norms and Vastu principles by ensuring proper alignment with the cardinal directions.
Spacious living room designed for social gatherings, positioned centrally in line with the entrance. It features ample natural light through large openings.
Adjacent to the living room, a dining area is included for family meals. The space allows flexible use with sufficient seating arrangements.
A well-equipped kitchen with modern amenities. It is located near the dining area and includes storage, workspaces, and ventilation as per building norms.
An integrated library space designed for reading and study. Books are neatly arranged along one wall in keeping with Vastu recommendations of knowledge areas being placed in the east direction.
Dedicated servant's quarters ensuring privacy and comfort, located at the rear side of the farmhouse, following local building norms for staff accommodation.
A storage area for kitchen utensils, garden tools, and other household items. The room is designed with a door facing west as per Vastu recommendations.

openings.description: Entry door to the house that allows ample light and ventilation in accordance with local norms.
Optimized window placement for balanced lighting and privacy.
